text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I overheard you talking, but... don't<n>get the wrong idea. This
isn't my<n>"moment."

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That's not true! Just say the word,<n>and I shall use the
power of the<n>golden ring!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I'm being serious here... Even if I<n>wanted to help, I'm not
registered as<n>part of your team.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but you are. I took the liberty of<n>registering you as a
backup member.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You what?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You even have an outfit. I asked the<n>director myself!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Huh? W-wait, you did this when,<n>exactly?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha! I had a hunch we<n>might want someone
waiting in the<n>wings to swoop in and save the day!<n>Call it
clairvoyance!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And when it came to picking our final<n>member, it could only
have been you!<n>For you and I clash, lift each other up,<n>and
at times join hands—we are<n>rivals!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Plus, you too found yourself drawn in<n>by Doto's wish to
bring happiness to<n>all, did you not? Your very being here<n>is
proof enough!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
U-umm, Ayabe? Are you sure you're<n>okay with this? It's
not too much?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Why would you think that?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You said you wanted to focus on<n>racing, didn't you? Isn't
this just<n>wasting your time then?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: It's fine. I'm choosing to help.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I know how hard you guys worked<n>for this, so... I mean,
what choice do I<n>really have?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: C'mon, Doto.

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
We're just about ready for the final<n>round of the National
Umamusume<n>Karuta Championship. Both teams<n>look
tense as their memorization time<n>concludes.

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Tracen's team had a member<n>swap. They've
changed positions too.<n>Guess one of their members really<n>
did get hurt.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I don't mind helping, but on one<n>condition... Doto and Opera,
you two<n>swap roles.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Running in karuta is different from in a<n>race. After being
taker this whole time,<n>you're getting tired, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: I can't hide anything from you, can I?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but if somebody has to swap with<n>Opera, you'd be better
than me...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Someone's got to go for the win...<n>and bring back happiness
for all of us.<n>That's you, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: ...Y-yeah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: C'mon, guys... Cough, cough!Please... let's not leave here with anyregrets.

text_block_list.name: Reciter Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Umamusume, on the cliffs...

text_block_list.name: Opponent Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Got it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: (They're so fast! Or more likewe're slow... W-well, figures,those four never practiced together...)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
(Ooh... I feel so useless... I hate this! In<n>their time of need I
can't even muster<n>a single cheer...)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: (C'mon, team... Please, please... Just<n>get one card to start!)

text_block_list.name: Reciter Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
The clanging of cleats alone, echoes<n>swiftly into dawn... As
the skies<n>themselves, light up in sunny<n>splendor, on this
springtime day—
Gotcha!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Great Fortune in the New Year<n>strikes back! I believe
this is the first<n>time we've seen this taker step up.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yippee! Fuku, I did it! "Ever so<n>carefree they grow: buds
upon the<n>cherry trees"!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I told myself, I have to at leastget this one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
(Yet again she continues to amaze!<n>Even in a pinch like this,
she's got her<n>eyes right on the prize.)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
(The simple desire to win is<n>something to nurture, not shy
away<n>from—that's what I've learned from<n>her!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
URARA! YOU GUYS! Take it one card at<n>a time! Bring home
the wiiin!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Doto! Go on the offensive—right,<n>three-five!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: On it! One card at a time!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Urara, set a screen! Cover for Doto!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: No one's getting in Doto's way!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
That one card really gave them a lot<n>of momentum, and
Team Great<n>Fortune in the New Year is not letting<n>up.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Doto, far back to the left!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You can reach it! Run!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: We're not stopping here... We're<n>going to win, and then...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: We're going to spend a happy new<n>year—together!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
That's it! Our national karuta<n>champions this year are the
rookies<n>from Tracen Academy, Great Fortune<n>in the New
Year!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days later, at the shrine...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Okie dokie, are we all ready? It's time<n>to tell the gods all
about the<n>tournament and pray for this year's<n>good
fortune!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: So... why am I here praying with you<n>guys?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why wouldn't you be? Imagine the<n>shining star of the
thrilling final act<n>missing the curtain call—unthinkable!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah... You also gave me the<n>strength I needed, and got
me all<n>those books on karuta...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
If it wasn't for you... we never<n>would've even come close
to<n>winning!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, can I ring the bell already?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, Urara, hold on a sec! C'mon,<n>guys, line up, line up! We
all have to<n>say hello together!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
O goddess above, O great Shiraoki!<n>We have done your will
and<n>endeavored in competition with<n>friends!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Getting to work together as a team<n>was a lot of f-fun. We
hope to keep<n>growing together, s-so...

text_block_list.name: All
text_block_list.text: Please bless us with another good<n>year ahead!
